content: पूर्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (Declined like a pronoun when it implies relative position in time or space, but optionally so in <ab>nom.</ab> <ab>pl.</ab>; and <ab>abl.</ab> and <ab>loc.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab>) {@--1@} Being in front of, first, foremost. {@--2@} Eastern, easterly, to the east of; ग्रामात्पर्वतः पूर्वः <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} Previous to, earlier than. {@--4@} Old, ancient; पूर्वसूरिभिः <ls>R. 1. 4</ls>; इदं कविभ्यः पूर्वेभ्यो नमोवाकं प्रशास्महे <ls>U. 1. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Former, previous, interior, prior, antecedent (<ab>opp.</ab> उत्तर); in this sense often at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> and translated by ‘formerly’ or ‘before’; श्रुतपूर्व &c. {@--6@} Aforesaid, before-mentioned. {@--7@} Initial. {@--8@} Established, customary, of long standing. {@--9@} Early, prime. पूर्वे वयसि <ls>Pt. 1. 165</ls> ‘in early age or prime of life.’ {@--10@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Preceded by, accompanied by, attended with; संबंधमाभाषणपूर्वमाहुः <ls>R. 2. 58</ls>; पुण्यः शब्दो मुनिरिति मुहुः केवलं राजपूर्वः <ls>Ś. 2. 14</ls>; तान्स्मितपूर्वमाह <ls>Ku. 7. 47</ls>; बहुमानपूर्वया <ls n="Ku.">5. 31</ls>; दशपूर्वरथं यमाख्यया दशकंठारिगुरुं विदुर्बुधाः <ls>R. 8. 29</ls>; so मतिपूर्वं <ls>Ms. 11. 147</ls> ‘intentionally’, ‘knowingly’; <ls n="Ms.">12. 89</ls>; अबोधपूर्वं ‘unconsciously’, <ls>Ś. 5. 2</ls> &c. --र्वः An ancestor, a forefather; पूर्वैः किलायं परिवर्धितो नः <ls>R. 13. 3</ls>; पयः पूर्वैः सनिश्वासैः कवोष्यमुपभुज्यते <ls n="R.">1. 67</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 14</ls>; अनुकारिणि पूर्वेषा युक्तरूपमिदं त्वायि <ls>Ś. 2. 16.</ls> --र्वं The forepart; अनवरतधनुर्ज्यास्फालनक्रूरपूर्वं (गात्रं) <ls>Ś. 2. 4.</ls> --र्वा {@--1@} The east {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country to the east of Madhyadeśa. --र्वं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Before (with <ab>abl.</ab>); मासात्पूर्वं. {@--2@} Formerly, previously, at first, antecedently, before-hand; तं पूर्वमभिवादयेत् <ls>Ms. 2. 117</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 94</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 205</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 35</ls>; प्रणिपातपूर्वं <ls>K.</ls>; भूतपूर्वखरालयं <ls>U. 2. 17</ls> ‘which formerly was the abode’, &c.; समयपूर्वं <ls>Ś. 5</ls> ‘after a formal agree ment.’ {@--3@} Immemorially. (पूर्वेण ‘in front, before’, to the east of’, with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>acc.</ab>); अद्य पूर्वं ‘tillnow’, hitherto’; पूर्वंः -ततः -पश्चात उपरि ‘first-then, first-afterwards’, ‘previously, subsequently’, पूर्वंअधुता or अद्य ‘formerly-now.’
